title: TOP 10 TIPS FOR YOUR TRACTOR'S 3 POINT HITCH!

tasks.task: Practicing and demonstrating three-point hitch attachment setup on tractors
subtasks: Turning tractor to park position and ensuring it's off
Checking ground level for attachment setup and adjusting if needed
Using pallets to elevate attachments for easier access
Aligning center link of three-point hitch with attachment's top pin
Attaching lower links to three-point hitch and adjusting as needed
Attaching top link to three-point hitch and adjusting angle for leveling
Demonstrating use of hitch assist system for easier attachment setup
Discussing troubleshooting valve settings for three-point hitch drop rate
Explaining PTO (Power Take-Off) selection and operation using the PTO lever
Highlighting importance of maintaining proper attachment alignment and adjustment

tasks.task: Practicing and demonstrating three-point hitch attachment setup on multiple tractors
subtasks: Turning each tractor (4066R, 3039R, 2032R, 1025R) to park position and ensuring they're off
Checking ground level for each attachment setup and adjusting if needed
Using pallets to elevate attachments on each tractor for easier access
Aligning center link of three-point hitch with attachment's top pin on each tractor
Attaching lower links to three-point hitch and adjusting as needed on each tractor
Attaching top link to three-point hitch and adjusting angle for leveling on each tractor
Demonstrating use of hitch assist system for easier attachment setup on each tractor
Discussing troubleshooting valve settings for three-point hitch drop rate on each tractor
Explaining PTO (Power Take-Off) selection and operation using the PTO lever for rear and mid PTO positions on each tractor
